title: Talisman Stone
description: Keychains with talismanic stones corresponding to your zodiac sign. Amazonite, Citrine, Aventurine, Blue Apatite, or your personal stone.

title: Sea Glass
description: Sea glass keychains from the Costa del Sol. Fragments of a whole become individual personalities, taking on new life.

title: Bird Dances
description: Asymmetrical, lightweight quail feather earrings with stones and beads are able to catch every movement of the air.

title: Mollusk couple
description: Light necklace with shell. The pearl shine is always reminiscent of the brightness of the summer sun.

title: Indian
description: An ethnic pendant crafted from tree bark on a braided cord in a warm shade. Incredibly lightweight, it's perfect for both summer and fall looks.

title: Forest Dreams
description: An Indian amulet, with the spirit of the green forest. A decorative home decoration in warm green tones that also protects against nightmares.

title: Memory Of The Sea
description: A contrasting sea glass pendant in warm brown and shimmering metal branches. Severity and softness in one piece.

title: Stars
description: Warm-toned decor made from natural materials will help create a cozy atmosphere without the clutter. Safe for pets and children.

title: Strong Wind
description: Wind Chime hanging decoration made from natural seashells. Suitable for outdoor use.

title: Paired Bracelets
description: Stylish unity in the details. Matching bracelets with tiger's eye beads and other natural stones. Adjustable, perfect for a couple or as a gift.

title: Harmony of the Elements
description: Minimalist bracelets with natural stones in warm shades. Hand-woven, adjustable clasp. A stylish everyday accessory or a symbolic gift.

title: Domino Game
description: Italian game originated in China (surprising fact). But in this set, the stones were replaced with plastic. The rules remain the same as in the 18th century.

title: Sound of the Sea
description: A wind chime made from natural shells with a soft, marine sound. Create a peaceful, summary atmosphere for your home, patio, or garden.

title: Magic tree
description: Traces of a city built by bark beetles in the Siberian forests. The unique curves of the corridors are forever imprinted onthis piece of wood.

title: Moon Land
description: There's nothing special about cement, just like the surface of the moonâ€” just dust. But in the light, this simplicity is transformed a hundredfold.

title: Coastal Shell
description: A piece of shell from the Andalusian coast. After a harsh adventure on the seabed, this fragment of shell has found new life in theembrace of soft cotton.

title: Orange
description: Citrine crystal. A semi-precious stone that suits almost all zodiac signs. The crystal provides its owner with energetic support during periods of low energy, apathy, and depression.

title: Chaos
description: Wind chimes in a chaotic style with random shells, each of which sounds different. A great gift for those who love the sea and its sounds.
